name: RosClaw
description: Control ROS2 robots through natural language via messaging apps

mode.description: Transport mode: rosbridge (Mode B), local (Mode A), or webrtc (Mode C)

domainId.description: ROS2 domain ID for local DDS communication

signalingUrl.description: WebSocket URL of the signaling server (e.g., wss://signal-host)

apiUrl.description: REST API URL of the signaling server (e.g., https://signal-host)

robotId.description: Target robot's ID on the signaling server

robotKey.description: Robot key secret (validated by robot, not server)

followMe.description: Native Follow Me: camera + Qwen VLM (Ollama) + cmd_vel. No external apps.

cmdVelTopic.description: Override cmd_vel topic (e.g. /robot3946.../cmd_vel). Empty = use robot.namespace + /cmd_vel

minLinearVelocity.description: Min linear speed (m/s) so base moves (e.g. 0.3)

depthTopic.description: Optional depth topic (RealSense) for real distance vs targetDistance. Empty = VLM distance_hint only.

transport.mode.label: Transport Mode
transport.mode.description: How the plugin connects to ROS2: rosbridge (WebSocket), local (DDS), or webrtc (P2P)

robot.namespace.label: ROS2 Robot Namespace
robot.namespace.description: Namespace for this robot's topics (e.g. robot3946b404c33e4aa39a8d16deb1c5c593). cmd_vel will be <namespace>/cmd_vel.

followMe.ollamaUrl.label: Ollama URL
followMe.ollamaUrl.description: For Follow Me VLM (Qwen). e.g. http://localhost:11434

followMe.vlmModel.label: VLM Model
followMe.vlmModel.description: Vision model for person detection (e.g. qwen2-vl:7b)

followMe.cameraTopic.label: Camera Topic
followMe.cameraTopic.description: ROS2 camera topic for Follow Me

followMe.cmdVelTopic.label: Follow Me cmd_vel topic
followMe.cmdVelTopic.description: Exact topic for velocity commands (e.g. /robot3946b404c33e4aa39a8d16deb1c5c593/cmd_vel). Overrides robot.namespace if set.

followMe.targetDistance.label: Follow Distance (m)
followMe.targetDistance.description: Target distance to keep behind person (default 0.5). Use depth topic for real distance.

followMe.minLinearVelocity.label: Min Linear Velocity (m/s)
followMe.minLinearVelocity.description: Minimum forward/back speed so the base moves (many need ~0.3)

followMe.depthTopic.label: Follow Me depth topic
followMe.depthTopic.description: RealSense depth topic for real distance (e.g. /camera/camera/depth/image_rect_raw). Empty = use VLM distance_hint only.
